For this week, we had to analyze our finding from our studies as well as create a presentation. unfortunately I was not able to get more than three participants, so I just went with what I had.

Usability 2 Reflection Journal Week 1

This week we learned about the Benefits of Remote Usability Testing  As well when remote usability could be more appropriate than in-person testing or face to face.
